Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2024-189: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.348-265.565
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-39480:
	In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:

kdb: Fix buffer overflow during tab-complete
